Statements.Statement: select AssetID, AssetName from FA_tblAssets where Stop = 0
select UMID, UMName from FA_tblUnitsOfMearsure where Stop = 0
select ZoneId,ZoneName from BS_tblZoneList where Stop =0
select ShiftID, ShiftName from FA_tblShifts where Stop = 0
SELECT DeviceId, DeviceName FROM SAFVIET_tblDevices WHERE Cumthietbi = 1
select Id, Attime, ShiftId from FA_tblShifts_Attime where Stop = 0
